content: As a result of both strong revenue growth and strong cost control, net income came in at $23.2 million or $0.27 per diluted common share, up 121% from net income of $10.5 million or $0.12 per diluted common share in the second quarter last year. With these strong operating results and strong AR collections, cash flow generated from operations came in at $46.4 million or just over 100% of adjusted EBITDA in the second quarter, up 36% from operating cash flow of $34.1 million in Q2 last year.
